title: What's news in v2.23.1
content:
Enhancements:
  - Preview "fit" button can be tapped to fit the content to the window
  - Added zoom scale selection to preview
  - Preview's background now matches the canvas's background
  - When multiple frames are selected, show the content of the latest selected frame
  - No longer show check box for frame multi-selection so we can see the frame number

Fixes:
  - Various crash fixes
